function.name: system.get_status
function.description: Provides a snapshot of the server's current status, including uptime, CPU usage, memory (RAM) usage, disk space, and NVIDIA GPU statistics (if available).

function.name: system.execute_command
function.description: Executes a non-interactive shell command with a timeout from a secure directory. Useful for git, listing files, or running simple scripts. Returns the command's stdout and stderr.

command.description: The shell command to be executed, e.g., 'ls -l' or 'python --version'.

timeout.description: Optional timeout in seconds. Defaults to 60.
